author: Staff Reporter
text:
Residents of Tirupur knitwear cluster woke up on Thursday to see a thick mist-covered city much to their surprise.

Visibility

Visibility was restricted to a few metres across the city till about 8 a.m.

“For a resident of city like Tirupur, it has been a different experience of sorts to see the surroundings engulfed by mist similar to that occur in hill stations,” observed R. Palanisamy, an entrepreneur who prefer morning walks.

Driving

Motor vehicle drivers had a difficult time while driving through the thick misty environment.

Many of the residents could see capturing selfies in their mobile phones with mist in the backdrop.
title: Mist in Tirupur
